title: Is it legal in Seattle for my landlord to sell stuff to me?
text:
My landlord keeps trying to sell Am\*\*y products to me and other roomates. I spotted the MLMS a mile away and I refused to buy any products. But is it legal for my landlord to do that?

my current lease still have a several months lef,  so does that mean I have to take this bs serveral month more?
